definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to wait and see/to watch from the sidelines/to look around/to survey
to visit/to pay a call to
outlook/prospect/to look ahead/to look forward to
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to hope for sth/to count on/hope

sentences.english: Mr. Kenge adjusting his cravat, then looked at us.
sentences.chinese: 肯吉先生整了整领带，然后又望着我们。

sentences.english: Hope scars, realized that even with life, are often trapped.
sentences.chinese: 望满身伤痕，才明白即使嬉笑一生，也常被困。

sentences.english: Please feel free to contact us for any questions you have.
sentences.chinese: 有任何问题，望直接与我们联系。

sentences.english: Many would like to board the mountains, Wang Jin End of the World Acacia color.
sentences.chinese: 多想登上高山，望尽天涯相思的颜色。

sentences.english: The sea, at certain parts of the coast, goes out so far that it can no longer be seen.
sentences.chinese: 沿海有些地带，潮落时海水退得很远，连望都望不到。

sentences.english: Opening my eyes, I saw a big boy glaring at me, a white washcloth in hand.
sentences.chinese: 睁开眼，一个大男孩望着我，手里拿条白色毛巾。

sentences.english: Surprised, the old man put on his spectacles and stared at him.
sentences.chinese: 那老人惊讶地戴上眼镜，望着他。

sentences.english: "I love the West, " she said. Her eyes were shining softly. She looked away and out the train window.
sentences.chinese: 她说，两眼流露着柔柔的光，撇过头望车窗的外面。

sentences.english: Daisy turned around and found that she was being watched by an elephant.
sentences.chinese: 戴茜转过身去，看到一头大象正在望着她。

sentences.english: Looking up into the sky, the players can not help stratagem to mind.
sentences.chinese: 抬头望向天空，队员们不禁计上心来。

sentences.english: Brain has already almost forgotten it, in a desperate paroxysm of self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 望的自我保护状态下，我的大脑已经将它忘记。

sentences.english: At last, future work and conclusion are given.
sentences.chinese: 最后对未来的工作入行了铺望。

sentences.english: I was standing next to the forsythia is still looking at.
sentences.chinese: 我站在旁边仍然在望着连翘。

definition: to raise one's head/to gain ground/account name, or space for writing the name on checks, bills etc
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to survey the scene from an elevated position
to hope for/to long for/to expect
to turn around/to look back/to recollect
to gaze afar/to look into the distance
to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
outlook/prospect/to look ahead/to look forward to
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
